languages.text: "Мелочь, что с них взять. Через год-другой вы их не узнаете — будут честь отдавать и говорить только когда старший по званию разрешит. А пока вот... дурят".
"Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."
languages.original_text: "Мелочь, что с них взять. Через год-другой вы их не узнаете — будут честь отдавать и говорить только когда старший по званию разрешит. А пока вот... дурят".

traits.locale_text: "Kids. You won't recognize them in a year or two — they'll learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, fooling around is all they know."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kids. You won't recognize them in a year or two — they'll learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, fooling around is all they know."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."

traits.locale_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."

traits.locale_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “年轻人就是这样，过一两年之后你就认不出他们来了。他们会学会敬礼，会只在得到上级官员许可的情况下发言。不过现在，他们只会到处捣蛋。”
languages.original_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."

traits.locale_text: “孩子们就是这样，过一两年之后你就认不出他们来了。他们会学会敬礼，会只在得到上级官员许可的情况下发言。不过现在，他们只会到处捣蛋。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Ay, críos. En un año o dos no podrá ni reconocerlos. Habrán aprendido a cuadrarse y a hablar solo cuando su oficial superior se lo permita. Pero por ahora solo saben hacer el payaso».
languages.original_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."

traits.locale_text: «Ay, niños. En un año o dos no podrá ni reconocerlos. Habrán aprendido a cuadrarse y a hablar solo cuando su oficial superior se lo permita. Pero por ahora solo saben hacer el payaso».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「今は幼いですが、1～2年もすれば見分けがつかなくなるでしょう。彼らは敬礼を覚え、上官の許可があるときだけ話すようになります。ですが今は、道化のように振る舞うことしか知りません」
languages.original_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."

traits.locale_text: 「今は幼いですが、1～2年もすれば見分けがつかなくなるでしょう。彼らは敬礼を覚え、上官の許可があるときだけ話すようになります。ですが今は、道化のように振る舞うことしか知りません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Junge. In ein oder zwei Jahren werdet Ihr sie nicht wiedererkennen – sie werden lernen, wie man salutiert, und nur sprechen, wenn ihr vorgesetzter Offizier es gestattet. Aber im Moment können sie nur Unsinn machen."
languages.original_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."

traits.locale_text: "Das sind Kinder. In ein oder zwei Jahren werdet Ihr sie nicht wiedererkennen – sie werden lernen, wie man salutiert, und nur sprechen, wenn ihr vorgesetzter Offizier es gestattet. Aber im Moment können sie nur Unsinn machen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, les jeunes... Dans un an ou deux, vous ne les reconnaîtrez plus : ils auront appris à saluer et à parler uniquement avec la permission de leur officier supérieur. Mais pour le moment, ils n'en font encore qu'à leur tête. »
languages.original_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, les enfants... Dans un an ou deux, vous ne les reconnaîtrez pas : ils auront appris à saluer et à parler uniquement avec la permission de leur officier supérieur. Mais pour le moment, ils n'en font encore qu'à leur tête. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Şu gençlik yok mu... Birkaç sene içinde hiçbirini tanıyamayacaksınız. Düzgünce selam vermeyi ve üst rütbeli subaylarla yalnızca izin verildiğinde konuşmayı öğrenecekler. Şu an tek anladıkları budalalık."
languages.original_text: "Young ones. You won't recognise them in a year or two — they will learn to salute and speak only when permitted by their superior officer. But right now, clowning around is all they know."

traits.locale_text: "Şu gençlik yok mu, şu gençlik… Birkaç sene içinde bu gençleri tanıyamayacaksınız. Düzgünce selam vermeyi ve üst rütbeli subaylarla yalnızca izin verildiğinde konuşmayı öğrenecekler. Şu an tek yapabildikleri budalalık."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
